thread.title: BRIEF-China Shun Ke Long Holdings Says He Jia Fu Resigned As Chairman

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Shun Ke Long Holdings Says He Jia Fu Resigned As Chairman

organizations.name: china shun ke long holdings ltd

text:
March 2 (Reuters) - China Shun Ke Long Holdings Ltd :
* HE JIA FU RESIGNED AS CHAIRMAN OF BOARD AND AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
* ‍LI ZHONGXU HAS RESIGNED AS AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER​
* ‍MUNG HON TING JACKIE HAS BEEN APPOINTED AS AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER​
* WANG ZHENG APPOINTED AS EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, CHAIRMAN OF BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
